column1: #Text=The polycrystalline B20-type FeGe samples were synthesized with a cubic anvil-type high-pressure apparatus.
#Text=A mixture of the elemental materials with an atomic ratio of 1:1 was synthesized by electromagnetic induction melting in an argon atmosphere.
#Text=The compound was placed into a cylindrical BN capsule and was heat treated for 1 h at 1,073 K under a high pressure of 4 GPa.
#Text=Structural characterization by X-ray diffraction and susceptibility measurements were consistent with the well-established structure and properties of bulk FeGe.
